decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:  Proposed Front and Right Hand Side Elevation drawing no.A.02,  Proposed Front and Left Hand Side Elevation drawing no.A.03, Proposed  Floor Plans drawing no.A.05, Proposed Section no.1 drawing no.A.06, Proposed Section no.2 drawing no.A.07 and Proposed Ground Floor Plans drawing no.A.08 (Proposed Plans rec.20/8/2021 to shown exact dimensions)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan 2021, policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1 and D4 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
description: Single storey side/rear extension (following removal of existing side bay window and rear addition)
